item.description:
Hi folks! Let's partake in a fun, invigorating, Saturday morning hike to celebrate the fall. Fresh air and exercise, and maybe some lingering color!

LOCATION: This Meetup will be at Sleeping Giant, which is a Connecticut State Park located in Hamden.

PLAN: Sleeping Giant is a great park for any level of hiking. For this Meetup, we will try one of the mid-level trails.

WHEN AND WHERE: Meet at the entrance, which is located on Mt. Carmel Avenue, between 7:45 and 8, and we'll try to get rolling onto the trail by 8:15. This particular hike shouldn't take more than 3 hours.

BRING: Water! (And a snack if you like.)

WEAR: Hiking or other sturdy shoes with treads; LAYERS; a hat.

COST: We ask for a donation of one dollar, towards the monthly fee that is charged by the Meetup Website. Please bring any contributions with you on the day of the hike.

DIRECTIONS: Please see link below.


PARKING NOTE: Please take advantage of the street parking on Mt. Carmel Avenue, adjacent to the park, ACROSS FROM (not inside) Quinnipiac University.

Sleeping Giant State Park Website
item.how_to_find_us: Organizer (Sarah) will be wearing a red sweatshirt and a green cap.

group.name: New Haven Walks in the Woods

item.name: New Haven Early-bird Hiking MID-FALL Meetup
